sentences.sContent: His findings are based on anecdotal evidence rather than serious research.
sentences.sCn: 他的发现依据的是传闻轶事，而不是认真的调查研究。

remMethod.val: 来自anecdote(n. 趣闻， 轶事)

words.tran: 讲轶事的人；搜集轶事趣闻的人（等于anecdotalist）

trans.tranCn: 轶话的， 逸闻趣事的
trans.tranOther: consisting of short stories based on someone’s personal experience
